messages.title: STOP THIS TORY NIGHTMARE
messages.content: We need an MP who will stand up for Cambridge and for working people. Vote Labour for real change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Daniel will back investment in public services to reverse the cuts and end austerity.
Fight to protect our NHS from being sold off to private providers and to secure better local mental health services.
Push the Government to go further and faster on climate change with a Green Industrial Revolution.
You’ll have the final say on Brexit – he will campaign to remain and reform.
Opposes cuts to schools and chaotic introduction of universal credit.

issues.brexitEurope: You’ll have the final say on Brexit – he will campaign to remain and reform.
issues.economy: Daniel will back investment in public services to reverse the cuts and end austerity.
issues.education: Opposes cuts to schools and chaotic introduction of universal credit.
issues.environment: Push the Government to go further and faster on climate change with a Green Industrial Revolution.
issues.health: Fight to protect our NHS from being sold off to private providers and to secure better local mental health services.
issues.socialWelfare: Opposes cuts to schools and chaotic introduction of universal credit.

housing.content: Daniel will back investment in public services to reverse the cuts and end austerity.

politicalExperience.achievements: Daniel has been a powerful voice for you in Westminster and he has opposed a hard Brexit.

contactInformation.address: Cambridge Labour Party, Alex Wood Hall, Norfolk Street, Cambridge, CB1 2LD

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the urgency of voting Labour to enact real change and to stop the conservative government. It also highlights Daniel's commitment to constituents and key issues.
